analysis.description:
BasicToken.totalSupply_ (/unique_chucks/47/0x2aa1b133f464ac08f66c2f702581d014e4603d31.sol#125-126) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/47/0x2aa1b133f464ac08f66c2f702581d014e4603d31.sol#130-132)

CappedSTO._forwardPoly (/unique_chucks/47/0x2aa1b133f464ac08f66c2f702581d014e4603d31.sol#1045-1047) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-polyToken.transferFrom(_beneficiary,_to,_fundsAmount) (/unique_chucks/47/0x2aa1b133f464ac08f66c2f702581d014e4603d31.sol#1046-1047)

BasicToken.totalSupply_ should be constant (/unique_chucks/47/0x2aa1b133f464ac08f66c2f702581d014e4603d31.sol#125-126)
IST20.tokenDetails should be constant (/unique_chucks/47/0x2aa1b133f464ac08f66c2f702581d014e4603d31.sol#327)
ISecurityToken.currentCheckpointId should be constant (/unique_chucks/47/0x2aa1b133f464ac08f66c2f702581d014e4603d31.sol#423)
ISecurityToken.granularity should be constant (/unique_chucks/47/0x2aa1b133f464ac08f66c2f702581d014e4603d31.sol#422-423)
ISecurityToken.investorCount should be constant (/unique_chucks/47/0x2aa1b133f464ac08f66c2f702581d014e4603d31.sol#424)

Low level call in CappedSTOFactory.deploy (/unique_chucks/47/0x2aa1b133f464ac08f66c2f702581d014e4603d31.sol#1067-1085):
	-require(bool,string)(address(cappedSTO).call(_data),Un-successfull call) /unique_chucks/47/0x2aa1b133f464ac08f66c2f702581d014e4603d31.sol#1085
